mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(version_info,'') AS version_info, IFNULL(version_number,'') AS version_number, IFNULL(version_type,'') AS version_type, IFNULL(app_url,'') AS app_url, IFNULL(version_describe ,'') AS version_describe FROM ts_app_version WHERE version_number > 100 AND app_type =1 ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1
